subject: Wider brake plate
description_text:
Hello,

Would it be possible to get a wider brake pedal plate? I love my
Simsonn SPRO-P3-H3s but I find that the brake pedal is too skinny to be
used both with left foot braking and when driving a manual car. I think
that this may be a good product for you as an add on to the pedal lineup.
If you are not interested in doing that, could you possibly send me a 3d
model of the brake plate so that I can make one? I want to figure out the
curve to the face and that would be the best way! let me know what you
think of these ideas!

-- 
Michael Osterhaudt
Email: 19mosterhaudt@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Osterhaudt,     The latest version of our PlusX pedal features a wider brake plate, and the thickness has been upgraded from 3mm to 4mm. The black version also uses a textured powder coating process for a premium finish.Â       https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals
